newsitem.title: USA: Talley Industries Inc Q1 shr profit $0.13.
newsitem.headline: Talley Industries Inc Q1 shr profit $0.13.

text.p: Earnings (loss) per share of common stock

(1) Royalties from automotive airbags ceased with the 1996 airbag litigation settlement. Airbag royalties recorded in the first quarter of 1996 were $7.3 million. Realty sales in the first quarter of 1996 were $1.3 million. With the disposition of substantially all realty assets at the end of 1996 there were no realty sales in 1997.

(2) Earnings applicable to common shares is net earnings reduced by dividends on Preferred stock in the quarters ended March 31, 1997 and 1996, and further reduced by the value of additional shares issued to induce conversion of the Series D Preferred stock for the quarter ended March 31, 1996.
(3) Series A, B and D Preferred stocks, all common stock equivalents, were anti-dilutive and accordingly were excluded

from average outstanding shares for the quarter ended March 31, 1996. Dividends payable on the anti-dilutive preferred stocks and the value of additional shares issued to induce conversion of the Series D Preferred stock were deducted from net earnings before calculating the earnings per share amount.
